name: Get to Da Choppa (itch)
description:
Get to Da Choppa is an entry for the  'Syntax Bomb' Retro Game competition 2017/18.  320x200 resolution and 16 colours.

Mostly inspired by the Amiga game:  Apocalypse.

Developed in Monkey2!

*** TOP SECRET ***

OPERATION: DA CHOPPA

You are a special agent of a top secret organisation. Your mission is to rescue all the hostages and recover the intel.

Good Luck!

Controls (keyboard customisable):

Cursor keys to move

Keyboard Z / Button A = Shoot

Keyboard X / Button B = Seeker Rockets

Keyboard C / Button X = Enter/Exit Choppa
